data.lyric:
[ti:Everything's Gonna Be Alright]
[ar:David Lee Murphy/Kenny Chesney]
[al:Everything's Gonna Be Alright]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Everything's Gonna Be Alright - David Lee Murphy/Kenny Chesney (肯尼·切斯尼)
[00:05.41]She raddled the ice in my plastic cup
[00:08.35]I said yes mam fill her up
[00:11.10]Tell me something good that I don't know
[00:14.48]
[00:16.02]'Cause this world's been kicking my behind
[00:19.00]Life ain't been a friend of mine
[00:21.84]Lately I've been feeling kinda low
[00:24.72]
[00:26.25]And she looked back over her shoulder
[00:30.57]
[00:31.22]Pointing at the sign hanging up on the wall
[00:35.89]It said
[00:36.76]Everything's gonna be alright
[00:40.92]
[00:41.73]Everything's gonna be alright
[00:46.30]
[00:48.15]And nobody's gotta worry 'bout nothing
[00:51.11]Don't go hitting that panic button
[00:53.71]It ain't worth spilling your drink
[00:56.72]
[00:58.18]Everything's gonna be alright
[01:02.41]
[01:03.03]Alright alright
[01:08.02]
[01:09.28]So I nodded my head and said that's for sure
[01:12.24]Dropped a few bucks in the mason jar
[01:14.95]Felt those good old neon vibes on me
[01:18.56]
[01:20.13]And whatever monkey that was on my back
[01:23.12]He jumped off just like that
[01:25.81]Right into the deep blue sea
[01:29.05]
[01:30.13]And I looked back over her shoulder
[01:35.10]Thinking 'bout the sign hanging up on the wall
[01:39.39]
[01:39.91]That said
[01:40.77]Everything's gonna be alright
[01:45.20]
[01:46.01]Everything's gonna be alright
[01:50.26]
[01:52.48]Nobody's gotta worry 'bout nothing
[01:55.03]Don't go hitting that panic button
[01:57.71]It ain't near as bad as you think
[02:00.82]
[02:02.15]Everything's gonna be alright
[02:06.57]
[02:07.12]Alright alright
[02:11.96]
[02:24.78]There ain't no doubt it's gonna work out
[02:30.01]Come on sing it with me
[02:33.05]
[02:35.41]There ain't no doubt it's gonna work out
[02:40.71]Come on and sing it with me
[02:43.69]
[02:44.84]Everything's gonna be alright
[02:48.96]
[02:49.65]Everything's gonna be alright
[02:54.29]
[02:56.31]And nobody's gotta worry 'bout nothing
[02:58.96]Don't go hitting that panic button
[03:01.65]It ain't near as bad as you think
[03:04.88]
[03:06.18]Everything's gonna be alright alright
[03:13.31]
[03:13.95]Alright
[03:15.96]
[03:16.70]Everything's gonna be alright alright
[03:23.88]
[03:24.42]Alright
[03:26.47]
[03:27.37]Everything's gonna be alright
[03:31.46]Is gonna be alright is gonna be alright
[03:37.11]
[03:38.01]Everything's gonna be alright
[03:42.15]Is gonna be alright is gonna be alright
